page.title: 10Some Interesting Old Houses
page.content: We went to Mrs Whites house which is called White Cottage.It is 250 years old and she had been living in it for the last 18 years.It was once three cottages used by farm workers.She said that it was not haunted.It had never been thatched.The sitting and dining rooms had beams and the doors had latches.The house had two modern rooms- the kitchen and a bedroom {Helen The White House was built in 1474.It was made from bricks and the roof was covered with Swithland slate.There is a rumour that the house has a passage to Kirby Castle.We know it was used as an inn until the nineteenth century. Inside you can see big timbers to hold up the roof. {James Cloke
